survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Sustainable Office Supplies Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding the purchase and use of sustainable office supplies to help businesses tailor their product offerings and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, biodegradable pens)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clear selection. Ensure the scale is intuitive (Never to Always).

script.question_text: How often do you purchase sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, biodegradable pens)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies have you used in the past year? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include an 'Other' open-text option if necessary.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes). Optionally include an 'Other' open-text field.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies have you used in the past year? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase sustainable office supplies?
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include an optional 'Other' open-text field for additional factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional 'Other' open-text field.

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to purchase sustainable office supplies?

questions.question_text: How much more are you willing to pay for sustainable office supplies compared to conventional ones?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Ensure the scale is clear and ranges are logical.

script.question_text: How much more are you willing to pay for sustainable office supplies compared to conventional ones?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainable office products would you like to see more available in the market?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What additional sustainable office products would you like to see more available in the market?
